prop.description:
# Refill Retroactive Funding and Small Grants Pool 

Proposal by Noun 22

The Retroactive Funding and Small Grants Pool is running low on ETH and needs to be refilled. Since [inception](https://nouns.wtf/vote/13) the group has funded a number of project trials, Nouns derivatives, tattoos, ⌐◨-◨s, and other contributions to the Nouns ecosystem.  The full list of everything the group has paid out is available [here](https://noun22.notion.site/noun22/Nouns-DAO-Small-Grants-ac22114a6c004bafa500e2d824e32dc3), with further context on recent activity in these tweets ([1](https://twitter.com/undeadnoun22/status/1529511556811472896), [2](https://twitter.com/undeadnoun22/status/1497274480783028225)).

As the DAO scales, Small Grants role has evolved.  This flexible pool of capital is here to serve the DAO's interest on a fully discretionary basis.

This group was formed with an initial pool of 20 ETH and was [topped up with 50 ETH](https://nouns.wtf/vote/31) in January 2022, and then again [with 100 ETH](https://nouns.wtf/vote/43) in March 2022. This proposal would top up the group's multisig with another 200 ETH.

votes.reason: Continue to feel that small grants committee funding has been one of the highest ROI funding proposals consistently. Funding Lil Noun's contract deployment before it was an obvious winner is one of many such examples. Really glad with the fact that along with on-chain DAO proposals and prop house we still have a discretionary pool of capital with an open mandate handled by committed nouners to swiftly act on all things that already have or have the potential to proliferate nouns.
i think this should always be a component of the meme proliferation strategy, rewarding those who take permissionless action is extremely nounish, imo
is great having comments. This is an EIP
what 40 said

Dutch Impressionist Vincent Van Gogh once famously wrote: "Great things are done by a series of small things brought together." It's amazing that he was able to predict Nouns Small Grants more than 130 years ago. Keep up the great work Small Grants Team!
Balance

We think a nimble, flexible, pool of capital is important for the DAO.

We would love to see more real-time transparency of the work of this pod. For example, a weekly report on the pod's discord channel on what was funded and what was reject. This way nouners can give faster feedback on the pod's decisions, and builders can learn what gets funded what not.
SG FTW

votes.reason: Ultimately, Nouncil was not able to reach a consensus on this Prop so we are voting to Abstain. After the majority vote to Abstain (16), all other votes cast were against (12.) Overall, in discussions, we felt that there are too many unknowns/unclear items WRT the case. Even if the Plaintiffs' motivations could be politically motivated, it seems PT may have indeed broken some lottery and/or banking laws in NY, or at least, it is far from a sure thing that they didn't. Moreover, it was mentioned that this should probably have been a planned-for eventuality for such a protocol (to be sued by the State) and Nouncil worries about the precedent of deploying Nouns treasury to fund this kind of predictable legal battle (hat tip Wag.) On top of the above, this was also not a small ask (which might have found broader support.) We wish PoolTogether the best with this case, but we couldn't vote to support this Proposal at this time.
Dont know enough about this to confidently take a side
Do not carry the proper knowledge on this matter to confidently vote yes or no.
We don't feel nuanced enough on the legal details to make a decision to contribute so much ETH to this cause.
I do not understand the legal nuances involved here and what impact they may have going forward and thus cannot, in good faith, vote in one direction or another.

We believe this lawsuit is a serious deterrent to legitimate  crypto innovation, and several of us have personally donated to this cause. 

Generally we think the DAO should only engage in philanthropy when the efforts of the collective are more impactful than efforts of the individual. 

That may indeed be the case here, but we believe more discussion is needed to address points brought up by fellow DAO members.

# Nouns x Vector DAO: Secret Nouns 1/1s drop at NFT NYC

# Nouns x Vector DAO: Secret Nouns 1/1s drop at NFT NYC
Nouns ℅ Vector DAO Proposal 

## Summary
Vector DAO will commission 8 artists in our community to design a series of unique Nouns artworks and print them on 200+ extra-large (6ft high!) wheatpaste posters around New York City for NFT NYC. Each unique poster design will be posted in a grid of 8 (all 8 posters will be the same artwork), with different designs being posted in their own grid of 8 across different locations, creating a scavenger like hunt to collect all 8 artworks.

Each poster will have a QR code that will allow individuals to mint 1 of 150 limited editions of each artwork. There will be 1,200 total mints at a price of 0.15 ETH each. All primary and secondary sales will go to the Vector DAO treasury to be used to purchase a Noun, replenishing the Nouns treasury. Any remaining ETH post Nouns acquisition will be split among the artists and team. As a stretch goal, we will try to support having the first 25 mints of each artwork be free, allowing this drop to be accessible to more people – this will depend on our ability to find an elegant sybil resistant solution in time.

Vector will provide photographers to take photos of all the posters to share on social to boost visibility (blurring out the QR code) as well as write an article about our collaboration experience with Nouns DAO to help future creators make proposals.

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HB7iq5Y.png)

## What’s in it for Nouns DAO?
### Spread the Nouns meme
- We're putting up 200 giant posters (6ft tall) around NYC during a high visibility week + taking photos to share online
- The artwork will be done by a roster of top tier artists with their own audience and community
- There's a fun game attached to being the first to find the posters and mint the limited NFTs, creating a viral loop to share back online
- Vector DAO will use proceeds from the mint to purchase a Noun, forming a long term relationship between Vector and Nouns, helping replenish the treasury, and cementing the culture of paying it forward to more nounish builders

### Pave a path for more creatives to contribute to Nouns
- We'll bring 8 really amazing artists into the Nouns universe, who will then talk about it with their friends, driving more high caliber builders to the Nouns universe
- This also forms a relationship with Vector DAO, a community of 80 super strong makers who are excited to further contribute to nouns
- We'll write an article about the entire process to help onboard more makers into the community

## The Artists
[Shawna X](https://shawna-x.com) | New Yorker, Academy Awards, Nike, Google
[Elijah Anderson](https://www.instagram.com/spacehose/) | Adidas, SNS / New Balance, Popeye’s
[Lulu Lin](https://www.instagram.com/da__h_/) | Adobe, MAYDAY Magazine, Migrant Journal 
[Adam Ho](https://www.adamho.com/) | Cash App, Beat Foundry, Airbnb, Nike
[Danny Jones](https://yasly.com/) | Grammy’s, Nike, New Balance
[Haruko Hayakawa](https://www.haruko.co/) | New York Times, Bon Appetit, Fly by Jing
[Moon Collective](https://www.instagram.com/mooncollective/) | Saturdays NYC, Instagram, Popi CBD
_And more (pending proposal approval)_

## The concept: Independent, together
![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/bYQ8hIH.jpg)
_(Similar concept for Art Basel in 2021)_

We’re commissioning 8 artists with distinct styles to create a series of posters remixing Nouns, showcasing each artist’s unique styles and perspectives (illustration, 3D, typography, color, etc). To create a consistent visual motif across the posters, the artwork must feature a Nouns artifact, but interpreted however the artist sees fit. Vector will have these artworks printed on 200+ wheatpaste posters and posted around the NFT NYC conference in Times Square and in neighborhoods like Williamsburg and SoHo.

Each poster will have a QR code where viewers can mint 1 of 150 limited edition NFTs of that poster’s artwork. Each NFT edition will have a mint price of 0.15 ETH and be sold using the [Zora Protocol](https://create.zora.co/).

We hope the end product not only propagates the Nouns brand and reflects the power of placing goods in the public domain, but also the power of individuals in forming digital communities like Vector to create across both digital and physical mediums.

## About Vector DAO
Vector DAO is a collective of artists, designers, and developers in web3. Our mission is to give individuals autonomy over all aspects of their work from lifestyle and creative freedom to team and compensation. We believe in a future where creatives and makers aren’t tied to any one employer but can freely contribute to communities, like Nouns, that excites them. We believe in the power of working independently, together. That means members run their own independent practices but share resources, risks, and opportunities as a community, working together in groups when projects call for it, or individually at other times. Over time, Vector hopes to prove this new model of working that other communities and builders can replicate, sustainably working for public goods and moving web3 forward.

## Budget
200 Wheatpaste posters in Times square, Williamsburg, SoHo [1]: **20 ETH ($36,000)**
8 Independent artists’ commission [2]: **100 ETH ($180,000)**
NFT mint mini-site design & dev [2]: **10 ETH ($18,000)**
Contribution process blog post w/ photos [2]: **0 ETH**
Total: **130 ETH**

_[1] Vendor: TBD, evaluating several proposals_
_[2] Vendor: Vector DAO Community_


## Timeline
**June 6, 2022** Artwork finished and sent to printers
**June 20, 2022** Wheatpaste posters printed and posted around NYC
**June 24, 2022** NFT minting closed

## Artist work sample
![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/d11dgfR.png)
_Shawna X (http://shawna-x.com/, https://twitter.com/shawnax, https://www.instagram.com/shawnax/)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/E5h0QiU.png)
_Danny Jones (https://yasly.com/, https://foundation.app/@yasly, https://twitter.com/yasly)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/Hc9nMJq.png)
_Adam Ho (https://www.adamho.com/, https://twitter.com/omgadamho, https://foundation.app/@adam)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/KGVtNIO.png)
_Elijah Anderson (https://www.instagram.com/spacehose)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/1Gazydq.png)
_Moon Collective (moon-collective.com, www.instagram.com/mooncollective)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/8DbrpCv.png)
_Lulu Lin (https://www.instagram.com/da__h_/, https://super-noodle.com/, https://www.itsnicethat.com/articles/lulu-lin-illustration-050319)_

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/WtWop9N.png)
_Haruko Hayakawa (https://www.haruko.co/, https://www.instagram.com/harukohayakawa/, https://foundation.app/@haruko/)_

prop.description:
# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural

# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural
By Nouns Collective

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/fJ9nndG.png)
_(Microsoft Surface Mural, Jasper Wong)_

## TL;DR
Let’s bring Nouns to the world through a global art tour starting with Nouns IRL in NYC! This activation will take place during NFT NYC (June 20 – 23) and will feature:
- Hand painted mural by Jasper Wong who is an artist and founder of Worldwide Walls (http://www.powwowworldwide.com/ 3), the mural will be viewable from June 20 – July 10 and will promote NFT culture by highlighting several well known projects with Nouns at the center.
- Simple website / landing page to commemorate the mural

**The activation is estimated to generate ~2.5M impressions. The total amount being requested is 87.5 ETH.**

## Why Should You Care? 
We can all agree that art is a pretty powerful communicator; it appeals to our emotions, forces us to think, and does a pretty good job of bringing us together on some level. We hope to use this power to accomplish the following: 
- Increase awareness of Nouns at NFT NYC—online and IRL
- Increase brand awareness of the Nouns DAO as a leader in the industry;
- Invite NFT enthusiasts and the public at large to become involved with the Nouns DAO community. We want to let people know that we are here and we invite them to come build the future with us; and,
- Create a website (nounsirl.live) that tells the story behind the art (plan is to also include art from other cities on the tour)
  - High-res images and time lapse video of the mural, artist’s explanation etc.
  - Links to Nouns website, twitter, discord, etc.  

## Nouns IRL — Person, Place, Thing
Nouns: person, place, thing… We thought that it would be really cool to bring this concept to IRL via fun and engaging art activations around the world. Each stop on the tour will feature a specific artist (or group of artists), a city, and an interesting Nounified art piece. Imagine Nouns on Venice Beach, or Nouns on a rehabilitated basketball court in Chicago. Imagine the looks on people’s faces if a huge inflated Noun floated by them in Miami. These art activations will vary in flight time from several weeks to several months, with the goal being to create longer lasting pieces that become a part of the cultural backdrop in the city. There are a ton of things we can explore on this tour and we think NFT NYC would be a perfect place to start. 

## Person
Jasper Wong, founder of [Worldwide Walls](https://www.instagram.com/powwowworldwide/?hl=en).

Jasper Wong is an artist, illustrator, curator and art director; his art style can be described as a unique clash of Asian-influenced pop culture on paper. Jasper has exhibited worldwide in places such as Japan, California, France, London, Mexico, New York, Hong Kong, Chicago, and Australia. Jasper is also extremely accomplished having been chosen as one of the HB100, a list of Hypebeast’s 100 most influential figures in the industry, which includes the likes of Kaws, Pharrell, Banksy, Jay Z and Kanye West.

Jasper is a big fan of Nouns, he has been following the project for some time and is very excited at the opportunity to get involved with the DAO. In addition to painting the mural, Jasper will be sending out Nouns-related messages on his social media platforms to engage his followers before and during the mural’s flight time. Jasper is also very well known within the art community and will attempt to leverage his network to invite some of his artist friends to hang out with him at the completed mural during NFT NYC. The goal will be to use both Jasper and his artist friends’ followers to generate additional traffic at the mural and further amplify social media impressions.

Jasper is very involved with the community through his non-profit organisation Pow! Wow! of which he is the creator and lead director. Pow! Wow! is a group of contemporary artists committed to community enrichment through the creation of art outreach programs, educational programs, and engaging the community in the creation and appreciation of art. Pow! Wow! has executed projects (murals, school renovations, basketball courts, etc.) in 13 cities around the globe, such as Honolulu, Taipei, Tokyo, Nepal, Guam, Seoul, Israel, and others. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/Gd2UFLO.jpg)
_(Jasper Wong)_

## Place
New York City during NFT NYC, the Super Bowl of NFT conferences.

NFT NYC is the perfect staging ground for the first Nouns IRL activation. One of the stated missions of the DAO is to attract builders/creatives who are ready to create products that proliferate the Nouns brand to a wider audience and shed positive light on the concept of DAOs. NFT/crypto enthusiasts attending NFT NYC are a perfect target for this mission as many are informed about the space and are also builders/creatives looking for a project to support. The general public present in New York at this time will be surrounded by a ton of NFT related themes which should generate interest and curiosity. Many of these people (who may also be builders/creatives) have not yet fully explored the crypto space, this will be an opportunity to capture their attention and encourage them to become involved with Nouns DAO.

## Thing
Sharable hand painted mural art piece promoting NFT culture (optimised for social sharing on Twitter and Instagram) and website.

We have encouraged Jasper to create a mural in his style that is a conversational piece. The mural will act as an introduction to the crypto space for many newcomers, we hope that it inspires a sense of curiosity and an urge to dig deeper. For those in the know, the mural will act as a proverbial nod of acknowledgment to the projects that have made an impact and have shed a positive light on the crypto space in general. The mural will showcase popular CC0 and non-CC0 projects such as BAYC, Doodles, Moonbirds, Cryptoads, Chain Runners, CryptoPunks, Coolcats, World of Women, Creature World, DeadFellaz, Okay Bears, etc. Each of these projects have extremely large and very loyal followings which we believe will ensure that the mural reaches the widest audience possible. The goal is to create a compelling piece which shows unity within the crypto space and inspires the viewer to get involved. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HKKgICa.png)

The mural will be located at 300 W Broadway, next to the entrance of the Soho Grand Hotel, facing the busy Holland Tunnel) and will measure 8’9” H x 16’ W in size.

As mentioned above, the ultimate goal is to launch a continued effort to promote Nouns worldwide through art. NYC is the first stop of the tour. The Nouns IRL website will act as an artefact for this and all future activations. The website will contain high-res images, time lapse video, artist bio, story behind the art, and links to the discord, the main Nouns website, discourse, etc. 

## Budget (all figures are in USD):
- Mural Wall: $62,000.00:
A soft hold was placed on the mural location until the 27th of May; we are in communication with the mural company about extending the hold for at least another week. If we are able to keep the current location, the cost for the wall will be $36,000.00. The $62,000.00 amount is a rough quote for an alternate location. We are in communication with the wall company to determine if cheaper locations are available. We are more than willing to return any funds that we did not end up needing to use to secure the wall.
- Artist: $40,000.00
- Team: $25,000.00
- Nouns IRL Landing page + capturing of video and photos for social: $11,000.00
- Travel / Accommodations: $6,000.00

**Total: $144,000.00, total ETH ask: 87.5 ETH**
_Based on $1,700.00 price of ETH as of May 27, 2022; we have added 2.5 additional ETH to try and account for volatility and fees._

## Team
This activation is being executed by the [Nouns Collective](https://twitter.com/Nounscollectiv3) (formerly the Collective DAO) which is a liquid super team made up of friends building playful, useful, and beautiful products and experiences with the crypto communities they love. We have previously contributed to the community via the [Nouns iOS app](https://www.nounsapp.wtf/) (proposal 6) which was officially launched on May 16, 2022. The Nouns Collective is composed of experienced founders, brand builders, and developers with over 15 years of experience building successful products. 

For this activation we have teamed up with [@miss_singh](https://twitter.com/Miss_Singh) who is a creative professional, cultural connector, community builder, experiential expert, and entrepreneur. @miss_singh has over two decades of experience that spans industries from tech, marketing, fashion and retail with her most recent gig being with Shopify. @miss_singh is extremely excited to jump into the Web3 world with us and looks to use her considerable experience and talents to deliver a memorable and lasting experience.

## To be Nountinued…

We are super excited to merge Nouns with IRL. The Nouns community is strong and vibrant; we hope to show the world who we are and what we are about. The best way to onboard more individuals, especially builders, into the space is to meet them where they are. DAOs, NFTs, blockchains, this can all be difficult to grasp for newcomers. Using familiar / traditional mediums of delivery (pop-ups, art, events, etc.) to introduce these concepts are an effective way to drive engagement. We hope that this stop on the tour will be the first of many to come!

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/9upXNjf.png)
_(Uniqlo Mural, Jasper Wong)_

Pow! Wow! has executed projects (murals, school renovations, basketball courts, etc.) in 13 cities around the globe, such as Honolulu, Taipei, Tokyo, Nepal, Guam, Seoul, Israel, and others. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/Gd2UFLO.jpg)
_(Jasper Wong)_

## Place
New York City during NFT NYC, the Super Bowl of NFT conferences.

NFT NYC is the perfect staging ground for the first Nouns IRL activation. One of the stated missions of the DAO is to attract builders/creatives who are ready to create products that proliferate the Nouns brand to a wider audience and shed positive light on the concept of DAOs. NFT/crypto enthusiasts attending NFT NYC are a perfect target for this mission as many are informed about the space and are also builders/creatives looking for a project to support. The general public present in New York at this time will be surrounded by a ton of NFT related themes which should generate interest and curiosity. Many of these people (who may also be builders/creatives) have not yet fully explored the crypto space, this will be an opportunity to capture their attention and encourage them to become involved with Nouns DAO.

## Thing
Sharable hand painted mural art piece promoting Nouns and a simple website.

We have encouraged Jasper to create a mural in his style that is a conversational piece. The mural will act as an introduction to the crypto space for many newcomers, we hope that it inspires a sense of curiosity and an urge to dig deeper. For the more experienced, the mural will act as an introduction to Nouns; we hope that it shows them the many possibilities of being involved with the DAO. The overall goal is to create a compelling piece which introduces Nouns to the viewer and inspires the viewer to get involved. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HKKgICa.png)

The mural will be located at 300 W Broadway (next to the entrance of the Soho Grand Hotel, facing the busy Holland Tunnel) and will measure 8’9” H x 16’ W in size.

As mentioned above, the ultimate goal is to launch a continued effort to promote Nouns worldwide through art. NYC is the first stop of the tour. The Nouns IRL website will act as an artefact for this and all future activations. The website will contain high-res images, time lapse video, artist bio, story behind the art, and links to the discord, the main Nouns website, discourse, etc. 

## Budget (all figures are in USD):
- Mural Wall: $36,000.00:
We have been advised by the wall company that a soft hold will be placed on the mural location for us at least until the 10th of June.
- Artist: $40,000.00
- Team: $25,000.00
- Nouns IRL Landing page + capturing of video and photos for social: $11,000.00
- Travel / Accommodations: $6,000.00

**Total: $118,000.00, total ETH ask: 72.5 ETH**
_Based on ~$1,700.00 price of ETH as of June 3, 2022; we have added ~3 additional ETH to try and account for volatility and fees._

## Team
This activation is being executed by the [Nouns Collective](https://twitter.com/Nounscollectiv3) (formerly the Collective DAO) which is a liquid super team made up of friends building playful, useful, and beautiful products and experiences with the crypto communities they love. We have previously contributed to the community via the [Nouns iOS app](https://www.nounsapp.wtf/) (proposal 6) which was officially launched on May 16, 2022. The Nouns Collective is composed of experienced founders, brand builders, and developers with over 15 years of experience building successful products. 

For this activation we have teamed up with [@miss_singh](https://twitter.com/Miss_Singh) who is a creative professional, cultural connector, community builder, experiential expert, and entrepreneur. @miss_singh has over two decades of experience that spans industries from tech, marketing, fashion and retail with her most recent gig being with Shopify. @miss_singh is extremely excited to jump into the Web3 world with us and looks to use her considerable experience and talents to deliver a memorable and lasting experience.

## To be Nountinued…

We are super excited to merge Nouns with IRL. The Nouns community is strong and vibrant; we hope to show the world who we are and what we are about. The best way to onboard more individuals, especially builders, into the space is to meet them where they are. DAOs, NFTs, blockchains, this can all be difficult to grasp for newcomers. Using familiar / traditional mediums of delivery (pop-ups, art, events, etc.) to introduce these concepts are an effective way to drive engagement. We hope that this stop on the tour will be the first of many to come!

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/9upXNjf.png)
_(Uniqlo Mural, Jasper Wong)_

# GOAT CLUB's Nounish Meme Factory

**TLDR;**
Order 69 nounish gifs, jpegs and mp4s for 15E from the first Nounish Meme Factory –hereby known as GOAT CLUB aka Goldy and tummlin (owners of noun #116).

![|300x300](https://media.tenor.com/images/307ba7102a129618fa4766d17a031e8b/tenor.gif)

**WHY?**
One of the founding principals of Nouns DAO is based on the thesis that backed by provenance, NFTs can be used as value capture for memes, and that therefore we should spend the treasury to proliferate Nouns as much as possible.

Nouns is digital (and internet) native, and the majority of people interacting with it are doing so on twitter and discord, so the first port of call should be to arm the nouns, and extended NFT and crypto communities with as much ammo for the meme war as possible.

![|573.526066350711x237.42583817429912](https://c.tenor.com/AIuauz6uAwUAAAAC/nouns-nouns-dao.gif)

**THE RIGHT TEAM FOR THE JOB**
Goldy has been a part of the Nouns community since early testnet, and Tummlin was lurking for a weeks before they purchased their noun together ~150 days ago. Both have already compulsively created all manner of high quality nounish, memish content, which has garnered hundreds of thousands of impressions, and been shared countless (no, literally, we don’t know how to do this) times on twitter and discord by the wider community to express their nounishness and spread the meme.

You can see gifs already by GOAT CLUB here: [https://tenor.com/users/goldypix
](https://tenor.com/users/goldypix)
And more nounish content below:

**![|588x832](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mc7wudpn0zraryj/goatclubnounishness_march2022.jpeg?dl=1)**

**CONTENT**
Our vision is to focus mostly on the content we know works; we want more of it. But we also want to be flexible, and move wherever both excites us and is getting traction. Part of the process will involve some experimentation to try to find new avenues for impact, ideally we unlock new nounish ideas. We will deliver within 1-3 months.

**We will mainly focus on:**  
* Nounish remixes of reaction gifs

**With a secondary focus on:**
* Nounified static memes, cartoon/comics, and pop culture remixes
* Nounish artwork (pixel art and otherwise) with cultural references and memetic resonance.

**And we may experiment with:**
* Brand new nounish memes (as opposed to remixing existing memes)
* Lo-fi nounish videos
* …Perhaps something not yet considered

**Community requests:**
* We will create a twitter hashtag, and a channel on the nouns discord for the project (or perhaps our own discord if its neccesary) for community members to request remixes, content or share ideas.

**Bonus**
* Livestream the creation of 1-2 gifs
* Timelapse of a creation of 1-2 gifs

![|444x235](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/SNtkogr9Bq5pFxATI3itMf_YblttSCdyqCWNdQJAj-Jox9AbWsYxYLQP8H8JaSM5_Hcy0nDcItBaAuDJiJbsSLB18rTWLnf8PPyzc3tO4NwG6zxpkTI1zxlwQzNwOVAlx-GbAw69)


**ACCESS & PROLIFERATION**
We’ll upload everything we make to accessible repositories for easy use, especially those with native integrations to social platforms like Tenor and Giphy, as well as a repository of all the things we have made and will continue to make (Google Drive or Dropbox etc.)

We’ll convert the most appropriately scaled work as Discord reactions (emotes) for extra ease of use. (Happy to either host these on a Goat Club discord server or give to Nouns DAO server admins).

We will also make dedicated efforts to share this content, as natively as possible (as well as find ways to encourage others) via twitter and discord to increase awareness of the existence of all of them. Connecting the gifs with a hashtag like #nouns or #nounify could be quite powerful.

![nounish-more|500x500](https://c.tenor.com/lCq21Mx-m0UAAAAC/nouns-nounsdao.gif)

**RISKS & REWARD**
**Worst case scenario:** 
There’s a whole bunch of new Nounish content to enjoy, share, and proliferate.

**Best case scenario:** 
We strike gold memetic gold and some content we create spreads far and wide on the internet, beyond our nounish bubble.

We’re big fans of Noun 40’s Retroactive Outsized Rewards idea in general, and we’d love for the DAO to be open to such a thing if anything we made here became a huge success (eg. millions of views etc).

![nounish-bet-casino 3|500x500](https://c.tenor.com/8IzaluQFhFwAAAAd/nouns-nounish.gif)


**THANKS!**
Thank you Nouners and Nounees, we look forward to hearing feedback, ideas and questions.

Goldy 🐐 & Tummlin 🐐

![nounish-thanks-partner-kid-4|380x283](https://c.tenor.com/bNL0vsp36oMAAAAd/nounish-nouns.gif)

prop.description:
# # Nouns DAO esports - Pokémon Unite expansion & BLVKHVND partnership trial

* Pokémon Unite team for 3 months
* Lots of Noun representation on twitch & youtube
* Mini documentary series following the tournament during their London trip
* Competing in $550,000USD worth of events over the next 3 months
* Trial and introduce BLVKHVND as operational partner for Nouns esports.
* Direct results and exposure between now and the end of August, no delay due from ‘building’

**Goal:**

To expand the Nouns DAO esports division operations and increase the audience reach for the nouns brand using the diverse, engaged global audience that gaming and esports presents. Additionally, to trial BLVKHVND as an operational partner for Nouns DAO esports.

**Pokémon Unite:**

Pokémon Unite released in June 2021 and is a MOBA for Nintendo Switch and Mobile. Currently the Unite Championship Series (UCS) season 1 is underway with 1 monthly final, the regional championships ($50,000USD prize pool) and the world championship ($500,000USD prize pool) remaining until the conclusion of the season.

The official Pokémon Unite twitch channel shows 36 hours streamed over the last month with an average viewer count of 2,398 and a peak viewer count of 20,574. That peak occurred during the European AEOS Cup finals, which our proposed team won first place in. Due to that we can assume that the European Regional Finals and especially the Pokemon World Championships will beat that viewer count.

**The Proposed Team:**

The proposed team we are looking to acquire is known as Random Gaming who have consistently placed 1st or 2nd in all European UCS events to date, including winning the AEOS Cup and the $20,000USD first place prize, with the top 2 teams from European Regional Championship qualifying for the World Championship on August 19th-21st in London we are confident in the team’s ability to qualify for this event.

The team consists of five players who are;

ADESu (Spain) - https://twitter.com/ADESuUnite 1 - Twitch
Redmaw (Norway) - https://twitter.com/redmaw_ 1 - Twitch
Bruv (England) - https://twitter.com/BruvHD 3 - Twitch 1
Gyz (Spain) - https://twitter.com/Cepriii 1 - Twitch
Ghatlue (Germany) - https://twitter.com/Gatlue 1 - Twitch

At the time of writing this proposal, the team in total has 976 hours streamed on twitch in the last three months with a team average of 56 viewers at any given time. Most notably is BruvHD who averages 167 viewers throughout his streams in this three month period.

**The Proposed Agreement:**

This proposal consists of a three month agreement with the team which will have them representing Nouns DAO for the remainder of the UCS. This agreement will consist of a signing bonus and funding a boot camp in London on the 15th - 20th of June in the lead up and during the European Regional Finals. This boot camp will be documented by a videographer to produce a mini series and various other forms of video content for the Nouns community to engage with and to spread Nouns around the gaming and Pokémon Unite community, we would be looking to utilize the Nouns DAO marketing studio, however we do have alternative options locally to London.

**BLVKHVND:**

BLVKHVND are the first decentralized esports organization, fielding teams through Halo, Counter Strike, Pokémon Unite, Apex Legends, Rogue Company and Blood hunt. Being knowledgeable in both the esports/gaming industry but also the web3 industry we are in a unique position to be able to contribute to this project with in depth understanding of both elements. Our involvement would be being the point of contact for the team, organizing and executing all the elements of this proposal and working alongside the existing Nouns DAO esports contributors in Sasquatch, Brennen and Brax to scale the current Nouns esports resources and continue to develop and improve the operations as well as increase our branding image and implementation of Nouns culture throughout the operation.

Our tasks include but are not limited to;

* Organizing and executing the Bootcamp in London on 15th - 20th of June, this consists of booking flights, accommodation, training facility, media for content creation and having a staff member on site to monitor and assist.
* Working with the players and media contributors to create engaging content and roll out on YouTube and Twitter.
* Monitoring events throughout the three month period and posting results to Twitter.
* Networking with the existing Pokémon Unite community to spread the Nouns brand through additional tournaments and media opportunities.
* Using BLVKHVND in-house media team in potential collaboration with the Nouns media studio to implement Nouns branding to the players social media accounts and content platforms such as youtube and twitch, this consists of banners, profile pictures and stream assets.
* Using BLVKHVND in-house media team in potential collaboration with the Nouns media studio to create engaging images and short form video to post to twitter during tournaments to drive engagement and viewership to Nouns esports tournament performances.
* Maintaining consistent communications with all the players on the team to ensure smooth operations throughout the agreement and guarantee a positive interaction between the team and Nouns esports.
* Pending qualification for Pokémon World Championships in London on August 19th - 21st, organizing all flights and accommodation in collaboration with the Pokémon Company. During the event having a staff member escorting the team to assist them with anything they require.
* Pending qualification for Pokémon World Championships in London on August 19th - 21st, organizing media for content creation surrounding the London event and working alongside them to roll out the media.
* BLVKHVND sourced the team presented in this proposal, negotiated on the proposed offer and constructed the proposal presented.
* All the expenses listed above being the labour, travel and accommodation are covered in the BLVKHVND management services fee. This includes the labour cost of designers, editors and videographers. The proposed fee will cover the full three months of operation.

**Content Creation Expenses:**

The proposed allocated amount for content creation expenses is 1.5ETH, this is to cover travel and accommodation for videographers to London for the boot camp and potentially for the Pokémon World Championship pending qualification. The videographer will be paid for their time out of the BLVKHVND management services budget, however their travel expenses are separated.

**Budget:**

3 month salary & signing bonus - 2 ETH per player (10 ETH total)

Bootcamp cost (Flights, accommodation & facility hire) - 3 ETH

Content creation expenses - 1.5 ETH

BLVKHVND operational management services - 7.5 ETH

Total: 22 ETH

**Multi-Sig:**

Brennen.eth (Nouns Esports DAO)
Sasquatch (Nouns Esports DAO)
Brax (Nouns Esports DAO)
Sirsu (BLVKHVND)
Teelon (BLVKHVND)

prop.description:
# Nouns Bidder POAP V2

## tl;dr
**Nounders, Nouners, and Nounish friends. ⌐◨-◨**
After an exciting V1 Bidder POAP experiment, the team is back with a proposal for a stronger, more robust, and more engaging Bidder POAP experience. With the top-tier UX talent from 0xDesigner, the unmatched creative prowess of SerNoadz, the development expertise of Plaid Shaman, and Brkfstsndwh (along with a direct line to Patricio and the POAP team), we aim to deliver a creative and engaging experience that will continue the spin wheel and proliferation of the meme to a whole new audience.

## Why
Through our V1 experiment, our team believes that having an ongoing incentive around bidding in the daily auction is not only beneficial to the DAO (promoting increased bidding on daily auctions to add capital to the treasury), but also allows more people to feel like they are a part of the DAO without actually winning the Noun on auction. POAP and team also have some fun ideas for incentives that will be coming via a secondary proposal (think, raffling off a Noun to POAP winners).

## What
- Revamped Gallery Page + Auction House and POAP Integrations
- More Advanced Claiming Mechanism
- Updated POAP Art with New Artists
- Retroactive POAPs for Winners Since V1 Ended
- 6 Months of POAPs and Management from Launch Date

## How
### Revamped Gallery Page + Integrations
- We will work with our team of designers and developers to create a revamped gallery page for showcasing the daily POAP, past POAPs, and winning bidders.
- This page will also show the live auction data for each daily auction, showcasing which bidders are currently in the running to receive one of the daily POAPs.
- Beyond that, we will integrate the POAP API more seamlessly to make the entire experience of the POAP page more engaging and informative.

### More Advanced Claiming Mechanism
- With our direct connection to the POAP team, we will work on building a more robust claiming mechanism than the direct send we conducted in V1.

### Updated POAP Art with New Artists
- Working with the incredibly talented SerNoadz, we will create a unique and updated art style for the Bidder POAPs.
- We will also aim to commission featured artists monthly that are voted on by the DAO to create unique POAP art in their own nounish style.
- Below is just an example of some of SerNoadz’s work, and is by no means the final art style. We will work with the community to land on the final and approved art style for the key POAP art.
- See example art and full prop [here](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-bidder-poap-v2/1440).

### Retroactive POAPs for Winners Since V1 Ended
- Once the art is complete, we will retroactively send all POAPs to their rightful winners since V1 concluded in May at Noun 296.

## Who
Producer + Project Manager | Brkfstsndwch
**Experience:** With close to a decade of production and product management experience, Brkfstsndwch has managed projects ranging from rebrands for some of tech’s biggest companies to 360 campaigns to website + app builds to feature-length documentaries and so many things in between. Brkfst was also responsible for the proposal and execution of the Bidder POAP V1 project, Nouns Coffee, and has been a part of the Nouns Community since the beginning.

Lead Artist | SerNoadz
**Experience:** An artist that needs no introduction, SerNoadz has been a staple in the Nouns community nearly since its inception, proliferating Nouns day in and day out with their project Noadz, among a plethora of other crucial pieces that have helped the DAO become what it is today. Most recently the current Nouncil site.

UX Designer | 0xDesigner
**Experience:** Being the lead designer on the POAP V1 project, 0xDesigner has a proven track record at executing to the highest degree. Beyond their involvement in the DAO, 0x is a product designer with a decade of experience working with companies ranging from seed stage startups to big tech like Facebook and Google. 0x has designed and helped launch over 50 digital products via founding a globally ranked UX agency.

Developer | Plaid Shaman
**Experience:** For nearly 20 years, Plaid Shaman (Brian) has been working with startups, agencies, and non-profits bringing 100s of projects to life. More recently, they’ve been collaborating on Web3 projects to create innovative experiences with NFTs and other blockchain technology. A few most recent projects have included, NounCats, Contract Reader, Chowies, and more.

Commissioned Artists | To Be Voted On by Community

### Timeline
**6-10 Weeks | Overall Timeline**
- 4-6 Weeks | Revamped Gallery Page + Integrations
- 4-6 Weeks | POAP Art Development
- 2-4 Weeks | Claiming Mechanism Development
- 1 Week | Retroactive POAP Shipment

### Budget
32.5 ETH | Revamped Gallery Page, Auction House + POAP Integration
- 12.5 ETH | UX Design
- 15 ETH | Development
- 5 ETH | Project Management

40 ETH | Updated POAP Art
- 20 ETH | Key Art Development
- 5 ETH | Art for Retroactive POAPs
- 10 ETH | Commission Budget for POAP Artists
- 5 ETH | Artist + Project Management

5 ETH | Updated Claiming Mechanism Development
6 ETH | 6 Month Management of POAP Sends
2 ETH | Retroactive POAP Sends
2.5 ETH | General Project Management and Community Project Lead

**Total Funds Requested | 88 ETH**

prop.description:
# Nouns cc0 Space Image Bank

# TLDR:

Space is one of the core themes in cryptoart and the NFT universe. This proposal is to ask Nouns to fund a repository of cc0 space images for all artists to use freely in their work. Sponsored by the Nouns DAO, the website will feature nounish elements as well as an "about section" with information about Nouns. The Nouns ecosystem will be proliferated through exposure to the artistic community as well as any potential exposure from the featuring of the space images on mainstream and specialized media. Total amount requested: 12 Eth.

# About me:
If you prefer to watch instead of reading, check out this short video I made for my SuperRare application to learn more about myself and my work. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iffK8n9uYuJgV8BmHjQaYXPuhgGmvHxi/view?usp=sharing

My passion for space and astronomy started at a very early age and I started shooting astrophotography about 7 years ago when I first paired a camera to the eyepiece of my telescope. After doing this as a hobby for several years, two years ago I decided to quit my job in TV and film production to become a full time astrophotographer. In early 2021 I minted my first NFT and throughout this past year I've released two collections and over 20 1/1 NFTs. During this past year, my work has been featured across several media outlets such as NASA’s Astronomy Picture of the Day and the European Space Agency's social media profiles, as well as a number of astronomy websites and magazines, and I've even had the honor of having one of my pictures used as a stamp of the Argentine Postal Service.



# Goal:

As a way to give visibility to the Nouns DAO, a cc0 image bank of space images will be set up that will serve as a repository for artists working on space-themed art. Space is a huge theme in cryptoart and NFTs. These images will be free to be used as subjects, backdrops and to be repurposed as artists see fit without the need to attribute authorship, giving artists complete control. The url **cc0images.wtf** has already been secured to this end.

**Nouns proliferation:**

The website would be designed in line with the Nouniverse aesthetics and would contain an "about'' section with information about Nouns. Besides strengthening ties and gaining visibility within the artist community, space images are regularly featured on specialized and mainstream media, which could potentially increase visibility to the Nouns community outside the art/NFT circles, by being featured by space agencies and more traditional media outlets reaching the general public. When published in  media, images would be credited to the photographer and the Nouns DAO.

**Website Mockup:**

![690x460]( https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_b37b352373d746f89df20b099d550a89~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_750,h_421,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/mockup%20portada%20copy.jpg)

![690x460]( https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_27fa02424e8f4ef095329ff2748b6f8d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_750,h_421,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/mockup%20about%20copy.jpg)

# About the images:

As technology has pushed forward during the past years, the ability to image deep space objects like distant galaxies or nebulae has stopped being the exclusive realm of observatories and space telescopes, and amateur astronomers worldwide now have access to hardware that allows them to photograph these stunning objects. Taking hours and sometimes several nights to shoot with long exposures, these hi-res images combine complex processing skills with specialized equipment, resulting in unique artworks that capture the beauty that lies in outer space.

# Example images:

*NOTE: These are example images from my current body of work, all of the images for the image bank would be shot specifically for this project as stated in this proposal.*

**Carina Nebula**

Located 7.500 light years away, the Carina Nebula is a region of ionized gas and space dust almost 500 light years across.

![690x460]( https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/e/e0388931de7aff71c05340b22cc050998b36d8f7.jpeg)

**Lambda Centauri**

IC 2944 or Lambda Centauri is an emission nebula located in the constellation of the Centaur.

![690x460]( https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/a/ab9e7457e1bc3f16493a8b4d0a80304251b6dbf4.jpeg)

**Sun**

Active regions 2993 and 2994 in the solar chromosphere imaged through a Hydrogen Alpha filter.

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_b522ed9029144fa9b06c10bab3629fbf~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_420,h_584,al_c,lg_1,q_80,enc_auto/16_50_32_lapl5_ap4496%20wavelets%20copy%20ps%20(1).jpg) 


**Moon**

30 panel mosaic of the Moon.

![690x460](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/2/2cba2114b0adcf3a73362bbb399e173c083af6f4.jpeg)


**Deepscape** the core of the Milky Way rises over the archaeological site of Yacoraite in the Andes. Image selected as NASA’s Astronomy Picture of the Day on May 8th 2021.

![690x460](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/3/3f2bdc87017cd8a34137724f1d5aceb926eb5cf5.jpeg)

**Milky way Mosaic**

![690x460](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/1/1b70940142967ce77186ed442560aae318969964.jpeg)


# Space in Cryptoart
Some of the most well known and successful artists use space imagery in their work, here’s just a few examples from top selling artists.

"[Dunescape XXIV](https://superrare.com/artwork-v2/dunescape-xxiv-21529)" by jstn

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_8f1de2baefe44db9ae9c9a4447ff152f~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_324,h_459,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/dunes%20by%20justin.jpg)

"[Space Pool](https://superrare.com/artwork-v2/space-pool-24421)" by MiraRuido

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_406407f725fb47a7b1c13d7c68b90876~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_419,h_419,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/Spacepool.jpg)

"[Follow Me](https://frankmoth.com/art/)" by Frank Moth

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_3a0752b9dded461aa73b6bcd49abff8a~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_419,h_559,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/follow%20me.jpg)

"[Space Head](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/80558671166428787868845713215115341808432523639303049960578709593636244291585)" by xmuratakyol

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_eca7c4610fda49da8bfdaed6303dbbc3~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_421,h_544,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/space%20head.jpg)

# Media appearences:

Here are a few examples of my images in mainstream media in the past year. All images from the cc0 Image Bank that are published in the media will be credited to the author and Nouns DAO.

**Newsweek online edition**

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_9f4055186e8f4d18a748a9264d9d312b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_503,h_510,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/newsweek.jpg)

**Nasa Moon account feature on Twitter**

![690x460](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/b/b53f3e0708f97d50e83cece3c76fdebdc98655ab.jpeg)

**European Space Agency**

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_757f0b3d634e4967ab6c4a2a14850d2f~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_470,h_341,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/ESA.jpg)

**NASA’s Astronomy Picture of the Day (exposure to 1.45 million followers on Twitter - 870k on Instagram)**

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_e4c4405dd8534915ab55fa1c141e60e8~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_391,h_609,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/apod.jpg)


**Deutsche Welle featured article on astrophotography**

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_e831eafbca3048118f2efff173586d22~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_494,h_664,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/DW.jpg)

**Postage stamp by the Argentine Postal Service featuring my December 2020 Total Solar Eclipse photograph**

![690x460](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/e2982b_391ef12c9ee74634a0830c47b56cf36a~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_484,h_538,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/stamp.jpg)

All of the above are examples where the Nouns DAO could get exposure through this image bank.

In time, the repository can grow and add other categories of images for non space-related art.

# Deliverables and timeline

A website with the Nouns DAO branding with a set of 30 space images available for free download under a cc0 licence. 

Deep space images take anywhere from a couple of nights to entire weeks and require careful planning to obtain, so this is a slow rollout project. Tens of hours of exposures as well as extensive processing time are needed in order to capture these objects, and most objects only appear in the night sky during limited periods of time during the year so the collection would be slowly built throughout an entire year. Some of the images will be shot from my rooftop observatory but others require traveling to dark sky sites. The images will be a balanced mix of deep space objects shot on telescopes, solar system bodies (Sun, Moon and planets), widefield images (star fields, milky way shots, star trail images) and landscape astrophotography, to offer a wider variety of objects and backdrops for artists.

Launch of the website would be scheduled six months after proposal is approved with an initial amount of 15 images at launch, and another 15 images would be added after a second six month period (this second update could be scheduled at shorter, more frequent intervals with a smaller amount of images).

# Budget

Project management and execution, consisting of planning and acquiring the images throughout a one year period - 5 Eth

Equipment upgrades (purchases to upgrade equipment already owned) - 3 eth

Expenses for dark sky sites travel - 2 eth

Website development and maintenance (according to scope of this proposal) - 2 eth

Total: 12 Eth

**Thank you for reading! Space is the Place!**

![bts|690x460]( https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/1/119e0d9c31a8ea8a0cec00f30be3cd5ca49a5493.jpeg)

# Nouns @ Art Basel (Basel, Switzerland)

# tl;dr
Nounify Basel using Guerrilla Marketing during 2 days of the Art Basel fair through various marketing campaigns, tying it up with my ([@beautyandpunk](https://twitter.com/beautyandpunk)) panel at the event.
For that, I’m asking the DAO for 16 ETH.

![B x Nouns at Art Basel](https://i.postimg.cc/7YwfdS1h/BatBasel.png)[B @ Art Basel](https://artbasel.com/events/detail/28655/Conversations-The-New-Patrons-NFT-Collectors-and-Supporters/18954)

# What is Art Basel?

![Art Basel](https://thumbs.gfycat.com/ChubbyFantasticBallpython-size_restricted.gif)

[Art Basel](https://artbasel.com/basel), exhibiting art of the 20th and 21st centuries, is indisputably the world’s leading fair in the international art market. Around 250 selected galleries from around the world present modern and contemporary works of high quality, making the fair the most important temporary museum.
Basel is where the art world meets. Art Basel is a meeting place for artists, art collectors and many celebrities from the art scene. The high-calibre exhibitions showcase various art forms, with both works by modern masters and art by emerging talents. Art Basel brings the art world to life – which is probably why it is so successful. 
The 2019 show in Basel attracted 93,000 visitors over six days. It presented 290 galleries from 35 countries, exhibiting the work of over 4,000 artists.

# What do we want to do?

Guerrilla marketing to make Nouns visible throughout the city during the 15th and 16th of June, all done through a marketing agency. How do we want to do that?
+ Give away chocolate! Distribute chocolate in Nouns branded packaging (containing a QR code to direct to nouns.wtf)
[![Choconouns](https://i.postimg.cc/kgJhhYh4/Choconoun-04.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/N5n4KDtq)
+ Floor ads (with chalk): Noggles will be spray painted in 50 placements in various places in the city
[![Floor ads](https://i.postimg.cc/W4tYsFVc/Choconoun-02.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/2qR7w530)
+ Posters: posters containing a Noun and a QR code will be placed around the city either in grids (3x3 and 2x2) or singles.
[![Posters](https://i.postimg.cc/y6nf3yNC/b4156choco.png)](https://postimg.cc/PNpbBZZS)
+ “Thomas Noun Affair” mob: we’ll have 12 people walking around the city wearing the same purple wig I will use for my panel (to maintain my anonymity) and large irl 3D printed Noggles on their heads. This is what I will be wearing at the event, with the difference that I will wear [Salvino D’Armati's](https://twitter.com/SalvinoArmati) creation. This will tie the marketing with a Nouner on Art Basel’s stage.
[![Thomas Noun](https://i.postimg.cc/rmsDnT5J/Thomas-Noun.png)](https://postimg.cc/nj8Vr6Rj)
+ Walking boards LED with QR code: 6 LED Boards with visible QR Code with people walking around the city with it.
[![Walking boards](https://i.postimg.cc/dV5SMRz9/Choconoun-03.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/0zJCDS56)


Total budget: 16 ETH
Breakdown:
+ chocolate: 1.4 ETH
+ floor ads: 2.4 ETH
+ posters: 2.6 ETH
+ mob: 2.7 ETH
+ 3D printed Noggles: 1.1 ETH
+ walking boards: 4.2 ETH
+ Social Media content creation (film and pictures): 0.3 ETH
+ Project Management (Swiss agency): 1.2
+ Graphic work (they create the visual for the boards and the posters): 0.1 ETH

Yours truly,
Um abraço,
B

⌐◨-◨

prop.description:
# Protect Treasury (down $43M since April)

Since its peak in April, the treasury has gone from $78M to $35M.

People calculate their expenditures in their native currency (typically dollars) and pay people in the same.

Having some bit in USD allows us to protect against massive downside while being able to pay people in the currency they calculate and pay everyone else in.

This was proposed months ago, and ignored - while such action wouldn't have saved an immense amount of cash, a 10% hedge would have saved ~$4M (which can fund A LOT of cool nounish things).

You might think that ETH can't go any lower, but keep in mind that it went from $1400 to $70 (-95%), right now we are at (-72%) with -95% being at around a price of $250. That would leave our treasury at $6.5M. 

I'm not saying that ETH is going that low, but it's not out of the question in crypto.

To add, we can always buy the ETH back. We have so much ETH, would it hurt to hedge against the chance of an additional 80% drop?

Do the prudent thing. Protect our treasury. Convert 10% of the treasury to USDT.

I'm not adding a transaction because there are a lot of ways to skin this cat and it may best be done with a TWAP.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wU9Daiu5XoM

~ Honk diddly.

# MOOØNBEANS: Nouns Baked Beans

**TL;DR**

MOOØNBEANS is a project that produces and sells premium OpenSauce baked beans, and proliferates Nouns by getting them into grocery stores. This is a world first: a community-owned baked bean brand, and a true collaboration between Nouns and Sublime Butter (that’s us). To deliver on this vision, we’re asking for $150,000 (c.135 Ether).

---

**Who we are**

We’re Sublime Butter Ltd. We’re a UK-based butter company with a huge array of awards under our belt. We have excellent in-roads with distributors, a proven track record of amazing product development, and a profound understanding of brand.

[![https://i.ibb.co/949CgRH/Awards.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/949CgRH/Awards.jpg)](https://sublimebutter.com/)

But that’s not all. We have in our midst a team of powerful developers, designers, storytellers, marketers and strategists who are at the absolute top of their game. Between us we have won two Emmy awards, three Webby awards, and had two BAFTA nominations.

---

**What are the opportunities?**

1) There are a variety of legal, regulatory and licensing must-haves required to be an FMCG brand. It also takes a lot of skill, knowledge and experience to develop, produce and distribute a successful FMCG product. This makes it a tough market for a DAO to break into. UNLESS you have us as a partner. 

2) The baked bean industry in the UK is ENORMOUS. Brits get through two million tins of them every single day. And yet, it is one of the plainest and most uninventive verticals on a supermarket shelf. We think this makes it ripe for disruption.

---

**Introducing MOOØNBEANS**

Nouns-branded baked beans, developed according to Sublime’s incredible recipe. Each 400g tin will be sold for c. £2.50.

We really want to stress that this is a true collaboration, a first-of-type web3/CC0/real-world merger. Nobody has ever done anything like this before, because such a relationship has never been fostered before. It’s truly symbiotic, totally unprecedented, and paints an extremely exciting picture for the future.

Each tin will feature a Nouns character that is also represented in our marketing and on-site. We’re thinking four tin variants should be a good place to start for launch.

Nouns DAO will get **20% of all profits** from MOOØNBEANS sales. 

Moreover, getting this right (which we know we will) opens up a huge range of other opportunities in the FMCG space, and therefore a huge range of prospective revenue streams into the Nouns ecosystem. 

![https://i.ibb.co/mHg8fJr/Can-V2.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/mHg8fJr/Can-V2.jpg)

*Here’s a mock-up of some tins. Note: This is **super early,** and designed for illustrative purposes only. The actual branding, tins, website, etc. — all of which are a part of the scope of work — will be truly, abundantly Nounish.*

---

**Why we’re doing this**

- We believe in web3/CC0
- We love Nouns and everything it represents; we want to raise awareness of Nouns in an area that’s usually difficult to break into
- We want to position Sublime as a pioneering FMCG brand in the web3 space
- We believe there are a range of collaboration opportunities here, and this is an excellent test case for future disruption together
- We want to build a solid foundation for the wider MOOØNBEANS ecosystem

**Budget**

We are asking for $150k USD to take MOOØNBEANS to market (c.135 $ETH at the time of writing). Proposal costings within the model have been denominated in fiat because of the nature of FMCG engagements and their payments.

Budget Breakdown

- Brand & Product Development – $25k USD
- Website & eCom – $25k USD
- Initial MOOØNBEAN Production – $35k USD
- Initial Marketing – $65k USD
- **Total: $150k**

Profits from MOOØNBEANS will be consolidated in ETH and proportionally distributed back to a Nouns wallet address of your choosing on a monthly basis from month seven post launch.

A full model for the proposal is available as a spreadsheet on request.

**Deliverables**

In terms of our approach to delivering this project, we wanted to stress that we’ll be operating with full transparency. MOOØNBEANS will function as a distinct profit centre, and all accounts will be made public for the Nouns community to view. 

In terms of specifics, we’ll be delivering the following:

- Brand development for MOOØNBEANS
- Content strategy
- Product development
- Distribution strategy (UK first, then US by next year)
- Basic website development
- Integrated eCom functionality built into both [mooonbeans.com](https://mooonbeans.com) and [sublimebutter.com](http://sublimebutter.com) enabling the purchase of MOOØNBEANS
- Marketing plan with a heavy focus on mainstream consumer press

**Benefits to Nouns**

- Access to CPG/FMCG
- Real world revenues; first of its kind
- Major marketing and PR exposure
- Exciting new way to get people into crypto
- Future potential (e.g. other verticals)

**Timings**

---

![https://i.ibb.co/HFYQt37/Whats-App-Image-2022-06-10-at-11-57-31-AM.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/HFYQt37/Whats-App-Image-2022-06-10-at-11-57-31-AM.jpg)


**Future Phases**

If you’ve seen V1 of this proposal, you’ll know that we have a big vision for MOOØNBEANS. One that extends beyond physical products. Once we have successfully delivered on this core proposition, we have a huge range of ideas that will deepen and enhance it — with a view to stimulating mass consumer adoption, further proliferating Nouns and its derivatives, and creating other FMCG goods that will expand the Nouns x Sublime brand universe. Ideas like:

- Educational content that guides novices through their first crypto transactions/interactions
- Games, stories, and easter eggs that spotlight Nouns and other communities

**Transaction Details**

tx1: 135E to sublime.eth (proposal funding)

tx2: 0.69E to apenoun.eth (coordination & prop building)

N.b. The plan will be to convert all the ETH to USDC/stablecoin assuming proposal passes

**Project updates**

Fortnightly Twitter Spaces

Fortnightly Medium progress update posts

Discord community updates

---

**Closing**

Thanks so much for reading and considering our proposal, Nouners. We’re always around to answer questions or even just to chat, so we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,

Team MOOØNBEANS

prop.description:
# NOUNS IN RIO - Nouns to be a part of the 1st Brazilian international NFT exhibition

# tl;dr

Nouns to be a part of the 1st Brazilian international NFT exhibition held in Rio de Janeiro.
30 June until 3 July 2022
22 ETH

⌐◨-◨


[![nounify-Rio.png](https://i.postimg.cc/XYbwhQSz/nounify-Rio.png)](https://postimg.cc/zVxbHwfC)


# WHAT?  

# The “11 Nouns as part of the exhibition” is already a done deal!

11 Nouns will be displayed during the event in Rio and on 300+ digital billboards in Rio de Janeiro (6.7 million people) and São Paulo (12.3 million people).

[![Billboards.png](https://i.postimg.cc/25mdMTv5/Billboards.png)](https://postimg.cc/zytRRCxm)


This proposal is for expanding, even more, the exposure that Nouns will have during the event which will be held at Parque Lage (Rio de Janeiro).
Parque Lage is a point of reference for artistic experimentation, research and innovation.
In addition, it is an impressive century-old building in the middle of the largest urban forest in the world (image below).


[![Parque-Lage.png](https://i.postimg.cc/q7SK0L6n/Parque-Lage.png)](https://postimg.cc/wt5MQDVT)



This proposal is a part of the broader Nouns DAO Brazil initiative led by [B](https://twitter.com/beautyandpunk) (Noun #137) to Nounify Brazil and bring Portuguese language natives into Nouns.

Based on the success of Japan, Art Basel, Nouns in Hong Kong and NounsDAO Amigos, we propose the following:

1. Pay NFT Rio a sponsorship quota as a way of thanking the event for welcoming Nouns. (Nouns in Rio was their pinned tweet for over 1 week).
The quota will also add:
+ Nouns on their website**
+ Mention in NFT.Rio’s social media.
+ 20 minutes of Nouns 101 talk in the sponsors' room (by [Leo Clark](https://twitter.com/leoclark)).
+ Noggles image to be displayed in the institutional video (during the intervals between talks).
+ Tickets for parties (Full PDF with details available).

** As a sign of good faith Nouns have already been added to their website.
http://nftrio.io/

prop.description:
# Sailing PR campaign, Korea Blockchain Week 2022 [6,7 August]

### tl;dr
Display Nouns glasses on 5 sailboats in the middle of Seoul during Korea Blockchain Week 2022.

### Summary

- Sail 40 km on five J/24 sailboats with huge Nouns themed sails.
- Location: Hangang river, Seoul, South Korea (population 15 million)
- The river is surrounded with two 20+ km highway roads, cycling roads, parks, and high-rise buildings. There are 13 bridges for cars, subways, trains, and pedestrians.
- The goal of the project is to promote NounsDAO during Korea Blockchain Week via online and offline engagement. We hope to put content on twitter and instagram during Korea Blockchain Week.

### Date & Time: August 6-7th, 8:00 ~ 18:00
### Location: Hangang river, Seoul, South Korea
- August 6th: Kimpo Airport→Gangnam
- August 7th: Gangnam→Kimpo Airport

###  Description
![https://media.giphy.com/media/XAc2QIWy9ha0ihzFjO/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/XAc2QIWy9ha0ihzFjO/giphy.gif)

- J/24 sailboat is the most famous sailboat model of all time! I propose to display nouns glasses on 5 sailboats in the middle of Seoul, South Korea. Seoul is home to 15+ million people and a lot of interest towards blockchain and NFTs among the population. The Korean government, businesses, and people are interested in blockchain and the NFT space. Hangang river is surrounded by two highways and will be a perfect place to reach lots of people during rush hours. The two way distance will be around 40+ kilometers. This could be a great opportunity to advertise NounsDAO and attract potential future members and developers.
- I know lots of sailors who want to participate in the Nouns Seoul PR campaign. I will create a fleet of five J/24 sailboats and sail along the river from Kimpo international airport to Itaewon bridge and back. This event is going to be organized for NounsDAO. There will be only 5 sailboats with spinnakers with Nouns Glasses logos.
- The idea is to make as many people remember Nouns-glasses. I identify two types of impressions offline and online. Images of Nouns glasses on 5 sailboat in the middle of the river will spark curiosity in the minds of the bypassers. This campaign is not a spam like poster or post that many of us learned to ignore without noticing. People would remember Nouns glasses and later when they attend a conference or buy NFTs they would recognize the Nouns symbol and would eventually come straight to the NounsDAO!
- The spinnakers are big and span an area of 8 meters in height and 4 meters in width. They definitely can be used as decoration at different events. I think the best use for sails is to give them to the teams. There are about five good regattas every year in Korea, I will provide more content free of charge when we race at different events. I am sure a pretty spinnakers with Nouns Glasses would be appreciated by the teams and used for many years.

### Map

![https://media.giphy.com/media/PS8lP8bBk0ICeuIYJE/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/PS8lP8bBk0ICeuIYJE/giphy.gif)

### Spinnaker sail designs
I have connections to Hyde sails dealership and can place an expedited order for 5 spinnaker sails with printed logo of the nouns glasses. The Nouns glasses will be permanently spray-painted at the sail makers factory.

![https://media.giphy.com/media/izhZ05ci17gQjL7oss/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/izhZ05ci17gQjL7oss/giphy.gif)

### Roadmap
- Spinnaker sails delivery in 3-4 weeks.
- Photos from sailing campaign will be available the next day
- Videos will be available in 1 week

### Budget 18 ETH
- 10 ETH will be used to get 5 spinnakers with a painted Nouns Glasses logos
	- Price of one spinnaker sail is $2,000
	- Cost to paint a logo is $300
	-Delivery fee is $100
- Five teams (5 sailors per boat) on five J/24 sailboats will join the Nouns fleet
	- Upon completion spinnaker sails will be given to the teams as compensation for their time
- 2 ETH prizes to teams (aka compensation for effort and time)
- 2 ETH compensation to two video/photo operators (stills, video, and drone footage)
- 1 ETH food & drinks for teams (two days)
- 1 ETH rent a motor boat for safety&media (safety needed)
- 1 ETH boat lift for 5 boats (launch boats to river and put back on land)
- 1 ETH boats mooring fee at the river (one night)

### Team
proposed by [https://twitter.com/fiveoceans_dev](https://twitter.com/fiveoceans_dev) aka [https://twitter.com/NounsNation](https://twitter.com/NounsNation) and Korean J/24 & J/70 sailing teams.

![https://media.giphy.com/media/prXoOPfP1xSxTKSX1w/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/prXoOPfP1xSxTKSX1w/giphy.gif)


### ETH wallet:
0x3e6791170d9514be84B5A1C17c217a0BFfc60976
